verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Christ was born to die
To submit while they cried, crucify
Now His purpose I see, is to fulfill it in me
Christ was born to die.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the way of a ship on the sea
Of a serpent, of an eagle so free
Of a man with a maid, God's great purpose is laid
In the way of a ship on the sea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To make of the twain one new man
It's His purpose, it's His overall plan,
To cleanse from within, one new man without sin
To make of the twain one new man.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ruth did glean in the field
Till her kinsman did call her to yield
Then a son came to be, that her people might be free
Ruth did glean in the field.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
A woman arrayed with the sun
In travail till the manchild is come
The deliverer he'll be
Who will set creation free
A woman arrayed with the sun.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
To go and sell what we have
To give to the poor for the great love of God
To lay all on the cross
And to count all things as loss
To go and sell what we have.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
This is the way into life
The calling of a man and his wife
Into union they'll come
That the manchild might be born.
This is the way into life.
